medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient transferred from rehab to OSH for acute worsening of abdominal pain. Denies nausea and vomiting, but rehab records indicate patient complained of nausea. Pain worsens when riding over a bump in the car. Had a small bowel movement with ducolax suppository.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hypothyroidism, atrial fibrillation on Eliquis, chronic constipation.
